    Cloud Projects

    Cloud Projects

    Welcome to my cloud portfolio. Below are selected architecture case studies demonstrating enterprise modernization, cloud-native transformation, secure cloud design, high availability, hybrid infrastructure, and scalable deployments across AWS.

    Projects

    • Modernizing a Legacy Web Application into an Enterprise-Grade AWS Architecture Role: Solutions Architect (Design & Implementation)
      Focus: Enterprise Application Modernization & Cloud Transformation
      Skills: Amazon EC2, Amazon RDS, Application Load Balancer, Auto Scaling, AWS Secrets Manager, IAM, VPC Architecture, Systems Manager, Well-Architected Design

    • Decomposing a Monolithic Node.js Application into Microservices on Amazon ECS Role: Solutions Architect (Cloud-Native Transformation)
      Focus: Microservices Modernization & Container Orchestration
      Skills: Docker, Amazon ECS, Amazon ECR, Application Load Balancer, Path-Based Routing, Service Decomposition, Node.js, Container Strategy

    • Designing a Serverless Event-Driven Reporting Architecture on AWS Role: Solutions Architect (Serverless & Event-Driven Design)
      Focus: Serverless Modernization & Event-Driven Automation
      Skills: AWS Lambda, Amazon SNS, Amazon EventBridge, Amazon RDS, VPC-Integrated Lambda, IAM Roles, CloudWatch

    • Hybrid Cloud Storage Architecture Role: Cloud Solutions Architect
      Focus: Hybrid Integration & Disaster Recovery
      Skills: AWS Storage Gateway, S3, Cross-Region Replication, Lifecycle Policies, Secure Storage Design, IAM, Encryption

    • Secure Web Application with AWS Cognito Role: Solutions Architect & Software Engineer
      Focus: Identity & Access Management
      Skills: AWS Cognito, S3, CloudFront, DynamoDB, Node.js

    • Encrypting Data at Rest with AWS KMS, S3, and EBS Role: Cloud Security Engineer
      Focus: Data Protection & Encryption
      Skills: AWS KMS, S3 Encryption, EBS Encryption, CloudTrail, Key Rotation

    • Creating a VPC Peering Connection in AWS Role: Cloud Solutions Architect
      Focus: Secure Inter-VPC Connectivity
      Skills: AWS VPC, Subnets, Routing, Security Groups, VPC Flow Logs, CloudWatch

    • Café VPC Networking Environment Role: Cloud Solutions Architect
      Focus: Network Segmentation & Secure Access

    • Scalable and Highly Available Web Application for Café Role: Cloud Solutions Architect

    • Highly Available Web Application on AWS Role: Cloud Solutions Architect
